text:
I don't know why. But the music difference of MM2 and MM4 always made me love MM4's sound track much better.

I DO NOT KNOW WHY THOUGH!?
Is it the differences of the tunes? The playfullness? The variations? The composers?!

It's annoying to like 4 better than 2 without knowing why! ><

text:
Yep, I prefer Megaman 4 over 2, but still prefer Megaman 3 and 9, The soundtrack is extremely underrated I prefer over the 2, songs like Pharaoh Man theme, Skull Man theme, Dive Man theme are amazing for the NES, and in my opinion the Cossarc's Castle is at least 4x times better than Willy's Castle from Megaman 2.
What is your favorite track and your least favorite one.
